descript.abstract: Cuba Economic Census Data (Province), 2002 is a polygon theme representing Provinces (1st level administrative units) in Cuba as of 2002. Attribute data include summary results of the 2002 Cuban census questions regarding economic characteristics. The documentation of these variables can be found in the "Economic" section from the accompanying code book. This dataset is part of Cuba 2002 Census collection.

enttyp.enttypd: File Geodatabase representing census sectors and associated attribute tables.
